attributes.action: Reject the Department of Health's proposal to automatically presume donor consent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While efforts to increase organ donations are welcome, this measure is a flagrant trangression of the boundaries of a democratic state's authority. Presumption of consent presupposes state ownership over the individual's corporeal form. This is not the case, nor should it ever be so. Those who do not wish to have to apply to the state to regain control over their own bodies should therefore sign below.

rejection.details: A similar petition aleady exists, see http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoDonorChange/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
